gene.function: FUNCTION: mRNA-binding protein involved in proper cytoplasmic distribution of mitochondria. Specifically binds mRNAs of nuclear-encoded mitochondrial proteins in the cytoplasm and regulates transport or translation of these transcripts close to mitochondria, playing a role in mitochondrial biogenesis. {ECO:0000255|HAMAP-Rule:MF_03013, ECO:0000269|PubMed:25349259}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Cytoplasm {ECO:0000255|HAMAP-Rule:MF_03013}. Cytoplasmic granule {ECO:0000269|PubMed:25349259}. Note=A fraction colocalizes with tyrosinated tubulin and can be detected close to mitochondria. {ECO:0000269|PubMed:25349259}.
